title: Citi Brings Iconic Pop Rock Band Mana to Guatemala
summary: Guatemala City, Guatemala - Citi, the leading global financial services company, together with Gallo Beer and Tigo bring pop rock band, Mana, to Guatemala for their "Drama and Light" world tour. The legendary group comes to Guatemala, after performing sold-out concerts in all major cities around the world.
tag-1: Citi Brings Iconic Pop Rock Band Mana to Guatemala
tag-3: Guatemala City, Guatemala – Citi, the leading global financial services company, together with Gallo Beer and Tigo bring pop rock band, Mana, to Guatemala for their "Drama and Light" world tour. The legendary group comes to Guatemala, after performing sold-out concerts in all major cities around the world.
tag-4: Mana will present a concert in Guatemala on November 2 at the Army Stadium, at 8 p.m. Guatemalan group El Tambor de la Tribu (The Tribe Drum) will open the concert.
tag-5: "This concert, which offers exclusive benefits to our customers, is just the beginning of everything that is to come. We invite everyone to join us in the most anticipated concert by Guatemalans and enjoy this exclusive show," said Juan Miro, CCO, Citi Guatemala.
tag-6: Tickets are now on sale at www.todoticket.com.gt or at any Todoticket kiosk, located at Plaza Obelisco, Eskala Roosevelt, Eskala highway to El Salvador, Galerias Primma Shopping Mall, Cafe Miraflores Shopping Mall, and Cafe Oakland Mall.
tag-7: The available concert ticket prices are:
tag-8: Citi customers wishing to purchase two or more tickets may apply for Citi discounts and three, six or nine monthly installments at spot price in the Todoticket kiosks. Tickets can also be purchased by redeeming Multipremios Miles. Visit www.todoticket.com.gt to purchase your tickets.
tag-9: Citi Citi, the leading global financial services company, has approximately 200 million customer accounts and does business in more than 160 countries and jurisdictions. Citi provides consumers, corporations, governments and institutions with a broad range of financial products and services, including consumer banking and credit, corporate and investment banking, securities brokerage, transaction services, and wealth management.
tag-10: Additional information may be found at www.citigroup.com | Twitter: @Citi | YouTube: www.youtube.com/citi | Blog: http://new.citi.com | Facebook: www.facebook.com/citi | LinkedIn: www.linkedin.com/company/citi
